title: Strengthening Teaching Methodology Practical Competencies: Workshop on Applying Learning Theories to Basic Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of five major learning theories (Behaviorism, Constructivism, Cognitivism, Social Constructivism, Situated Learning) and their application in science education.
Learners can design a simulated curriculum by applying learning theories to a given educational scenario.
Learners can develop assessment strategies based on learning theories and apply them in a summative assessment-oriented environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
